data.name: マグネクション磁
data.detailed_description:
It is a 3D action game "マグネクション磁" for PC!
A completely new magnetic force operation 3D action game presented by the team "HOT".
Release! float! Stick!
Full of new gimmicks using magnetic force!
In this game, by applying a magnetic force to an object on the stage or wearing a magnetic force by itself, the stage is captured using the repulsive force and attractive force of the north and south poles.
Please play the game made by the three college students! !!
data.about_the_game:
It is a 3D action game "マグネクション磁" for PC!

Please play the game made by the three college students! !!
data.short_description: This is a Magnetic force operation system 3D action game. By changing the objects on the stage and their own poles, we will capture various stages using the repulsive force and attractive force of the magnetic force.
